name: Breadwinner Dinner
description:
You know how it is. You are on a dinner date. The one on the other side of the table is beautiful and funny and there's only one thing you are there for. The food. However, the restaurant only has that much food and you do not want to go home hungry. You lock eyes with your table partner and the game is on.

Breadwinner Dinner is the ultimate dinner experience for two players.

Breadwinner Dinner was made during a game jam weekend in January 2020. The game Jam was held at The Game Assembly in cooperation with Coffee Stain Studios.

Winner of category Most Goat Simulator.

Rikard Carlsson - Scripting, Music
Hjalmar Danielsson - Scripting, Programming
Ville Westermark - Animation, Character Art
Emma Hugin - 3D Art
Weronika Kowalczyk - 3D Art

You need 2 controllers to play this game. Xbox controllers works super duper.
